visualization_prompt: Generate a bar chart showing gender distribution percentages in Swedish professions using stacked percentage formatting and custom color encoding

title.text: Swedish top 10 professions dominated by women (16-64 years) in 2017

visualization_explanation: This visualization presents a 100% stacked bar chart comparing gender distribution across professions in Sweden. The dataset contains 9 categorical observations (professions) with two numerical variables (male/female percentages) summing to 100% per category. Synthetic data maintains proportional integrity with inverse correlation between gender series (r = -1.0). The stacked percentage format adheres to Tufte's data-ink principles by eliminating redundant axes while maintaining Cairo's proportional perception through position-aligned encoding. Custom monochromatic coloring (#C0C0C0 for male, #0C090A for female) ensures clear distinction while supporting grayscale reproduction. Tooltip configuration follows Schneiderman's detail-on-demand principle with percentage-formatted precise values.
